result.title: Sparse Table RMQ Build-O(N log N) Query-O(1)
result.content:
#define N 111111

int st[N][20];
int a[N];
int query(int i, int j) {
	int k = (int)log2(j - i + 1);
	return min(st[i][k],st[j - (1 << k) + 1][k]);
}

void solve()
{
	int n;
	cin >> n;
	REP(i, 1, n + 1) {
		cin >> a[i];
		st[i][0] = a[i];
	}
	for (int j = 1; (1 << j) <= n; j++) {
		for (int i = 1; i + (1 << j) - 1 <= n; i++) {
			st[i][j] = min(st[i][j - 1], st[i + (1 << (j - 1))][j - 1]);
		}
	}
	int x, y;
	while (cin >> x >> y){
		cout << query(x, y) << endl;
	}
}
